affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 事情, 真实的, 事物

word_mean_info__list.difference: 含义较广，多指无意识地回忆起往事，也可指通过主观努力去记忆。
指有意识的下功夫把某事的整个细节都记在脑子里。
比remember文雅，指想方设法回忆已经遗忘之事。
指经某人或某事的提醒而回忆起某件已遗忘之事。
指在记忆中搜索，设法想起一时想不起的事情或人，强调过程。

word_group.brief_definition: 不能被记起的, 召唤不回来的, 不能挽回的；不可取消的
产品召回；商品召回；召回产品

bilingual.source: The government decided to recall the ambassador.
bilingual.target: 政府决定召回驻外大使。

bilingual.source: He tried to recall his memories from college.
bilingual.target: 他试图召回他在大学时的记忆。

bilingual.source: The company faced flack after the product recall.
bilingual.target: 产品召回后，公司面临了批评。

bilingual.source: She couldn't recall all the details of that day.
bilingual.target: 她无法召回那天发生的所有细节。

bilingual.source: The company faced a knockback after the product recall.
bilingual.target: 产品召回后，公司面临挫折。

bilingual.source: They are handling a large-scale product recall.
bilingual.target: 他们正在处理一个大规模的产品召回。

bilingual.source: The company decided to recall all defective products.
bilingual.target: 公司决定召回所有有缺陷的产品。

bilingual.source: The product recall is to ensure customer safety.
bilingual.target: 这个产品召回是为了确保顾客的安全。

bilingual.source: The product recall affected thousands of customers.
bilingual.target: 这个产品召回影响了成千上万的顾客。

bilingual.source: The company issued a precautionary recall of the product.
bilingual.target: 公司发布了产品的预防性召回通知。

list.abstract: recall（英 [rɪˈkɔːl]，美 [rɪˈkɔːl]），英语单词，作动词为记得；回想起；回忆起。作名词为召回；记忆；检索率。短语搭配有beyond recall（不能被记起的，召唤不回来的，不能挽回的）。例句为“Please follow me to recall his story.（请跟我一起回忆他的故事。）” recall相关近义词有think of、come back等，相关反义词有forget、issue。

yingyinNormal.en: What about narrative? A recall of that size will be disruptive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那整个故事线怎么办？如此大规模的召回，会引发极大的混乱。

yingyinNormal.en: Should give us cover to recall the remaining hosts. And the guests will love it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那应该可以帮我们掩盖召回剩余接待员的行动，客人们一定会很喜欢的。

yingyinNormal.en: We recall all remaining updated hosts tomorrow. Examine them one by one, decommission the faulty ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们明天必须召回所有被更新的接待员，一个个检查，废弃掉残次品。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't recall playtime being quite that strenuous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不记得玩游戏是这么艰苦卓绝的事情啊。

yingyinNormal.en: We recall with our feelings. Anything real should be a mess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得勾起人内心的感受。真实的记忆应该是一团乱麻。

yingyinNormal.en: If you recall, I pointed out the Check Engine light to you several months ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还记得么，几个月以前，我告诉过你引擎检修灯在闪。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you fall down and smack your little head on the pavement? Not that I can recall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在人行道摔伤脑袋了？我不记得有啊。

yingyinNormal.en: The intimacies were your idea, if you will recall. I think Bernard was glad of the company.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的交合是你提出的，如果你还记得的话，我想伯纳德不过是顺水推舟罢了。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you remembered nothing? Recall the lessons of Adam Smith, the father of modern economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们什么都不记得了吗？回想亚当·史密斯，现代经济学之父那课。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you high? You'd have a better shot with the three breasted Martian hooker from Total Recall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你嗑药啦？你跟《宇宙威龙》里有三个咪咪的火星妓女在一起的可能性更大点。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I don't recall making any confession. What would I be confessing to? You can listen to it later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不记得坦白过什么。我有什么好坦白的？你可以晚点自己听。

yingyinNormal.en: Recall that? A hostile alien army came charging through a hole in space. We're standing 300 feet below it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还记得吗？一支从太空穿越而来的外星军队入侵地球，我们就在下方三百英尺。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, where are my clothes? You know, I do recall seeing some female undergarments. Where was that? Oh, yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我的衣服在哪儿？好像我是记得看到过一些女式内衣什么的。在哪儿呢？哦，对…

yingyinNormal.en: Now, let's see if I can recall. "Faith, I can stand it no longer, I've confessed to my crimes. Please forgive me."
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看我能不能想起来。“费斯，我再无法忍受了，我认罪了。请原谅我”。

yingyinNormal.en: The boy has changed greatly since coming to us. He did not come to us, Sire. He was left. A fact that bears recall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比起刚来时，他已经改变了很多。不是他主动来的，陛下，他是被人抛弃，这事实有待商榷。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we'd much rather have you there, but he's doing a fine job. Doug, do you recall anything? About what happened?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们更希望是你在，但他还不错，道格，你记得什么吗？关于事发经过。

yingyinNormal.en: I also come to pay condolences and to inquire as to your heart. I lost a good friend. Your only friend, if I recall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来也是为了慰问你，还有看看你怎么样了。我失去了个好朋友。我记忆中，他是你唯一的朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Alice, at last. You were just as dim-witted the first time you were here. You called it Wonderland, as I recall. Wonderland.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爱丽丝，至少你和第一次来这里一样傻乎乎的，我记得你把这里叫做“奇异世界”。奇异世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, interesting. Do you recall this conversation? Leonard, want to go halfsies on a steamer? No, Sheldon, we don't need a steamer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哟，真有意思，你还记得我们这段对话吗？"莱纳德，要不要跟我摊挂烫机的钱？""不要，谢尔顿，我们又用不到。"

yingyinNormal.en: Abernathy and Walter were exhibiting other aberrancies beyond memory recall of previous builds. They were hearing voices. Talking to someone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾伯纳西和沃尔特出现了其他异常现象，不仅仅是回忆起先前的故事设定，他们还出现了幻听，与人对话。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样明智的是，记住这些标题并不是万灵药。

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>recall</highlight> the day my grandfather died and the sadness I felt when we went to the hospital the day before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还能回忆起我祖父去世的那天，以及前一天我们去医院时的悲伤。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They have difficulty <highlight>recalling</highlight> what they have eaten.

examination_example.sentence: Without numbers, healthy human adults struggle to precisely distinguish and <highlight>recall</highlight> quantities as low as four.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有数字，健康的成年人很难精确区分和回忆低至4的数量。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers have found that students who sign up to tutor others work harder to understand the material, <highlight>recall</highlight> it more accurately and apply it more effectively.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，和其他学生相比，给别人提供辅导的学生在知识理解上会更下功夫，知识回顾更准确，知识应用更有效。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Please follow me to <highlight>recall</highlight> his story.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请跟我一起回忆他的故事。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>recalled</highlight>, “I found out that she was someplace that she said she wasn’t."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她回忆说，“我发现她在某个她说没有的地方”。

examination_example.sentence: Stephanie Stone, a US native, <highlight>recalls</highlight> her experience studying in the UK.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Stephanie Stone是一名美国人，她回忆了自己在英国学习的经历。
